content: KH-EZ P Screw anchor Ultimate screw anchor for quicker and more economical fastenings to concrete (carbon steel, pan head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Low-profile and small washer-style head for easier installation through access holes Quicker and easier to install than wedge anchors – no cleaning, no high-accuracy torque wrench and no hammering required Easier to set, even under critical conditions – optimized screw threads and cutting edges suitable for high-strength concrete, used drill bits, rebar hits, and other challenging base materials For use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special tolerance drill bits required when installing these screw anchors Fully-removable concrete screw anchor Applications Glazing, window wall and store front attachments Strut to concrete applications Door threshold anchoring Attaching handrails and glass shoes For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Pan head Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Pan head | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | IBC compliance | IBC 2018 | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 2265706 -
